response.original_title: Toy Skeleton haunted and possessed - This Is Demonic Crazy
response.overview: This was given by gypsy woman as a gift to a friend for Halloween. It's suppose to only sing and dance. But, something went horribly wrong after it stopped working. It broke and was put away and a year later it was brought out and cleaned and checked to see if it would work.  To my friends shocking horror it started saying things that weren't in it's siniging vocabulary. This thing only sang one song when it worked and now instead of singing it said something evil.  "What the hell do you want" with glowing eyes as its head snapped towards the friend it spoke to.  All you Demon skeleton are belong to us
response.title: Toy Skeleton haunted and possessed - This Is Demonic Crazy

results.name: Toy Skeleton haunted and possessed - This Is Demonic Crazy
